review: Tons and tons of movies and TV programs.  However, so far I have not found any movies really worth watching.  Many movies are not free either!
author: Jerry Block

review: Worked as expected and easy to install.
author: Don

review: quick & easy to install and use
author: Pinda "Pinda52"

review: Awesome!!! I love it.  I actually bought 2 more.
author: eric

review: I received this unit as a replacement to a faulty unit I had purchased previously. Initially I had some issues with the set up, this may be a refurbished unit. It was stuck on " loading video" message. I had to cycle the power to the unit two times and it started working. Since the little hiccup at start up it has been working great! No issues at all.
author: An2wan76

review: Loved the fire stick! Everything I expected out of it and more.
author: Celina Sanchez
